text: A missionary traveling through India found a faquir, chained, naked like a monkey, lying face down and getting whipped by the sins of his countrymen, who gave him some coins. - What a self-denial! - said one of the spectators. - Resignation of myself? - he said the fachir. I'll get whipped in this world to give it back to you in the next, when you're a horse and I'm a rider. Finished Philosophical Dictionary, 1764
title: Amor propio II
author: nan Voltaire
